content: Cooooool game, but keep updating::::::thx for response,
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, hopefully next bigger update will be available during next week.

content: Great Game Lots of Fun, Should deffintly add a way to play local Multiplayer from more then one device, Hot seat is fun but more devices in a LAN game would be great!

The game itself is quite fun and each faction feels unique to the game which is also great. The only reason I am giving this 4 stars is due to a game crash during a battle where everything was frozen after the enemy turn, and because some of the objects on the world map have been spotty in whether they show up or not. Overall a fun game that scratches the itch of a turn based fantasy strategy game!
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, could I ask you for contacting us over the email. So we can find what exactly went wrong and fix it. Because we have never experienced such a problem.

content: I must be missing something because this game is so boring. I found it on a list of top rated strategy games but there's virtually no strategy involved. You literally just recruit monsters and walk around the map fighting people. There are no decisions to make - you don't even pick the hero you start with. And no story/campaign mode either. So disappointed.
replyContent: We are sorry that you dont find our game as exiting as you thought. Maybe you really missed something, because you can select the hero in main menu(during game setup) and in horizon of weeks we will release new update with improved gameplay and right after it will hopefully finish campaign mode. So if you give us one more chance, we would be glad

content: Waste of money. The movement of troops is spoty, very difficult to select a piece and move it. There really isn't much strategy to the game. Its very simple minded. Although it has some of the aspects of a strategy game its arrangement is very juvenile. If not for the difficulty of moving troops I'd say it would be a good game for kids but it's too frustrating to move around the board
replyContent: We are sorry that our game doesnt fulfill your expectations. But we never experienced such a feedback connected to difficulties with troops moving. Moreover most of the users said exact opposite, that it is user friendly and easy to use. Can you be more specific what is problematic on your device? Or you can contact me over the email. Thanks

content: A really good game. Has a bit of a learning curve, especially with the startegy. I remember skipping levels and thinking it was impossible, only to come back later and wonder why it was so easy.
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, we really appreciate it. About the learning part, it really could be challenging but we are now testing a new version with improved tutorial too. So we hope it will helps a lot.

content: Best game I've seen in a long time. Worth purchasing just to support developers like this, with no IAP and a lot of skill. I find it a shame that many of the best games for Android have such low sales. I was mad when IAP was introduced and, I have come to the conclusion that too many people rather buy their way out of using their brains. HoF is what I think mobile games should be. If you like tactical turn-based games, HoF is a must! Story mode will be even better.
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, we really appreciate it and it keep us moving forward.

content: Terrific game. Challenging, gorgeous, intuitive controls (once you get the hang of it). Would love to see some stats when you finish a match, like each faction's total gold collected, units created/killed. But if you like turn-based strategy this hits the spot
replyContent: Thanks for nice review, we appreciate it. Moreover thank you for your idea about post match statistics, I really like it. I will try to add it asap.

content: Bought the game when it first released on Android. Never had any issues the devs are very active and it continues to get better. Highly recommend to fans of the genera. Not to mention that I love the style of art.
replyContent: Wow, thanks for such a kind review. We really appreciate it. Moreover, new update with campaign mode is coming soon

content: Just started playing, but so for amazing. Been wanting a strategy, with no micro-purchase that most games have. My brother and I are also developers, and thought we haven't made a game in a while, we know how challenging it is. Excellent work. I'm definitely looking forward to new additions. I think some form of story based progression would be cool. Also, I appreciate how tough the game is, reminds me of older games, where you really had to work at it!
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, we really appreciate it. We currently preparing the story mode, but it is little bit more complex than we expected. But we are almost finishing it.

content: Very well made game,great graphics... It does get difficult,possibly a pay wall,but it could be my lack of skill,lol... Not a bad game,tho!!
replyContent: Thanks for your kind review. Well, the game could be little difficult in the beginning. But there is also diffuculty setup in main menu during map selection.

content: Looked like a great game. The reviews were promising so I spent the $2. The game is pretty lopsided. It takes way too long to build the army up. Meanwhile, the enemy leader is killed and within just a few minutes is back and even more powerful than before.
replyContent: We are sorry that the game doesn't fulfil your expectations. We know that the game needs some skill, but you can lower difficulty in scenario setup in main menu. This is the game mechanics, where whenever you or your opponent hero dies, he will be ressurected in nearest town in three days. Anyway feel free to contact me over the email for refund

content: Hero's of MM meets Age of Wonders with thoughtful adaptions to make it more phone-friendly. Light turn based strategy with impressive graphics for the type. 100% worth the up-front price with no nasty grasping iaps in sight. Love the sound of your planned improvements- lots of potential here.
replyContent: Thanks for kind the review, we really appreciate it. It pushes us forward.

content: Great turn based game! Love the new update!
Great game. Some story mode would be great.
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, we are just working on campaign mode, so hopefully it will be ready soon

content: Game is alright. Not something that would get me sucked in for hours. My suggestion is add in a auto mode for people who work. Don't got hours to sit and press my phone all day waste of nature
replyContent: Thanks for comment. Currently you have option to resolve battles automatically, could you be more specific, how auto mode proposed by you, should work? Or you can contact us over the email, due Google Play comment length restriction.

content: hi, where are the new maps? when will the campaigns be added? the game is great keep it up!
replyContent: Hi, thanks for review, about maps and campaign, we are still working on it. Unfortunatelly we had few issues that need more work, but we hope it will be ready soon.

content: Fun game. Gets repetitive after 10 hours or so
replyContent: Thanks for review, we are preparing campign and some more improvements in gameplay...

content: Really high quality and no in app purchases.
replyContent: Thank you, we are still working on it and hopefully more maps and campaign will be ready soon.

content: Cool game! Looking for a HOMM type game for a long time, and this one comes close! Interesting characters, town development, interesting classes, and quite well balanced! Hope that the game keeps developing with cool updates, perhaps a campaign mode?
replyContent: Thanks for nice review, we are just working on campaign mode..

content: Fantastic with a couple requests. It would be cool if there was a full story mode within the game. Secondly, It would be neat if you could unlock more heroes for each race. Have one starter and make it so a second and third could be unlocked, maybe even a choice of different hero to start with. Over all though, fantastic game, well made and I love it!
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, we are currently preparing campaign story. Hopefully it will be available soon. About more heroes, we plan it too. But at first we need to implement higher priority things like campaign, hero skill trees and more. You can choose hero in scenario configuration page in main menu, by clicking on shield with questionmark.

content: Totally worth the $.
This is what Heroes of Might and Magic V (HOMM) should have been!
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, we really appreciate it. Moreover lots of new maps will be added this week.

content: Solid turn base strategy, needs more engaging story and faster battle mechanics. Has a lot of potential though
replyContent: Thanks for your review, we are curently working on the campaing mode. Hopefully it will be ready soon. Can you be more specific about battle mechanics? We are quite open for any good tips. Feel free to contact me over the email..

content: amazing. All it needs it's an update :). More content, otherwise, well done!
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, new update with with enhanced world maps and lots of new scenarios coming really soon.

content: Really cute game, but needs an undo button and volume control. Version 1.3.6: so buggy I have to abandon most games.
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback, undo button will be really helpful and we add it to our todo list. Unfortunately it will be little bit harder to implement and we need to work on items with higher priority. So I can't estimate, when it will be ready.
About volume control, we are just reworking all sounds with sound designer and volume control will be too.

content: blank screen on start up
replyContent: Hi, we are sorry about that, but never experienced similar problem. Could you contact us on email. So we can make further investigation, whats wrong?

content: Great overall experience. Great graphics. The game seriously lacks content in it's current state. You should introduce larger maps, or give a tool to the players to build their own maps. Huge units upkeep price cripples the overall gameplay and game experience.
replyContent: Thanks for review, we are just finishing new update where you can find enhanced maps and lots of new scenarios. Hopefully it will be ready within a week or two.

content: content is a work in prgorss but game play and strategy is quite good. look forward to updates
replyContent: Thanks for your review, new update with lots of new scenarios and enhanced maps will be available in week or two.

content: Maybe a great game, but it doesn't seem to have a settings panel anywhere to turn off audio. It's an instant deal breaker for me.
replyContent: We are sorry that absence of mute button is such breaker. We hope that classic mobile volume will be enough. But ok, we will add it in next update.

content: tried to play the tutorial and the game would not let me move on. it would want me to click on a specific building or location but did not do anything when I did.
replyContent: Could you be more specific, in what section of tutorial problem appers. We once experienced quite same problem, when user should use long click on specific building (for more information about place), but only tries normal click. Isn't it the same problem? You can contact me over the email too.

content: Greet HOMM type game. Well worth the price and surprisingly polished. I'm yet to find a bug. Looking forward for any future updates. Great job again.
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, next update will be ready in few weeks and bring lots of new maps, with enhanced graphics.

content: This is a great game.
can't wait for a sequel

This game is a lot of fun but it runs its course way too fast. Theres a decent variety of playable races but theres no campaign, so you run out of scenarios pretty fast. But its perfect for when you need to kill a half hour or so.
game is generally fun and easy to pick up. not much depth yet, as all skills/upgrades are selected for you (no tree choices). also, a more detailed manual or forum would be nice.
replyContent: Thanks for the review, you are right skill/upgrades are quite simple, but we are just thinking about some more complex leveling system, with more choises for player. About dividing units, you need to drag&drop unit to any free slot in your army, then small bar over unit slot appears, where you can choose how many units will stay in old slot.

content: it's ok as a HOMAM like but the battle controls are just not good enough edit - thank you to the team and kudos to them for getting in touch!
replyContent: Thanks for feedback, can you be more specific what you miss in battle controls? We are always open to improvements, so feel free to contact us over the email.

content: A great mobile "Heroes of _____" game - if you liked heroes of might and magic, this is for you. Whilst it's not as deep as those games, and is seriously lacking a campaign mode, it's fun, the combat is tight, and it presents a challenge.  From what I can tell, this has been a passion project for a team of 2. They've resisted the temptation to add IAP's, and the game really shines for it. Absolutely worth the money.
replyContent: Thanks for kind review, campaign is definitely planned to be. Unfortunaly we have some other things with higher priority, that need to be done before, like random map generator or revision of heroes leveling system. But right after that we will focus on campaigns. We just finished new dwarf faction, that is available in update.

content: Good old memories back! The game mimicks Homm. I liked the spells. No online multiplayer? why?
replyContent: Thanks for your review, we are still working on our game. Online multiplayer is in our plans right after new faction(will be available in few days) and random map generator.

content: 3d app version of PC Heros of Might and Magic, Great job 👍

Things i hope to see. Double map size maybe even triple. Which brings up more heros would be needed 2-3. More gear for heros/exploraition map activities. If you have more than one army drag your other army into battle within a certain radius feature..Looks like online multiplayer will be added one day, which is exciting to see. I really enjoy the game so far and hope to see it progress into something bigger. Raise the price if you have to :)
good . more factions and map generation would be great
replyContent: Thank for feedback, both mentioned things will be ready soon. New dwarf faction is almost ready, we are in final testing stage.

content: Great game! good graphics and gameplay made me want dig out my old homm games. Was abit let down with no campaign or story to it. I think it would have pushed it to five star. Glad you added another race though whats next dwarves or humans ?
replyContent: Thanks for support, we are just finishing new dwarfs faction. Moreover we are working on random map generator. After that we can focus on campaign mode.

content: Awesome game! I have been looking for this blend for a while now. Thanks for leaving that in app store nonsense out! Should you want to expand on this system further, that would be sweet! (Like some added hero progression.)
replyContent: Thanks for feedback, we have plan to improve hero leveling system at all. Basically we want to add skill tree, so you will be able to decide what skills do your hero would have.

content: This is going to be good. its ok right now as it stands ( more of a three star ) I gave four stars because this has alot of potential. hopefully it will be on par with games like age of wonders before long.

The game is definitely fun and reminds me of playing Hero's of Might and Magic. Hot seat takes me back to early 90s PC gaming with my brother. The maps could be larger but it's 100% worth the money. I hope to see scenario updates in the future. Oh, and no IAPs!!! Don't see that very much without spending $10+
Great game, reminds me of how Heroes of Might and magic, the PC game is. Just needs alot more levels, or maybe even an auto generator. Not even sure if that's possible but still worth a shot.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for feedback, we are actually preparing new playable faction and right after this, we will focus on random map generator.

content: superbly well done. please make more games and more content!
replyContent: Thanks for feedback, we are just working on random map generator and enhancing world maps at all

content: love the game never left a review before but this will this game was definitely worth doing so. played with 2 of my buddies at NTC cause we were bored and he was searching up this game. was skeptical at first but we spent 4 hrs playing it as hot seat. we all ended up buying the game. only thing we need it the multiplayer function so we could play together when we're out in the field
replyContent: Thanks for your review, we have online mulitplayer quite high in our todo list. So we hope, it won't take a long time and it will be available..

content: Dobry den ;) Alas I have some issues: 1. Edit: The tutorial is now working and Lord Hycis is moving before I enter the enemy territory and even in the when I enter it 2. Not many sounds. E.g. I am using a spell like a fireball but it makes no sound, that is not satisfying... When you move you should hear sounds depending on the unit like footsteps, wings, an ethereal sound etc. And when the whole army moves it would be nice to hear a marching sound. I like the graphics
replyContent: Thanks for feedback, I will take a look at problem in tutorial you mentioned. You are right with point two, we are just working with sound designer on adding all in-game sounds and effects to our game. We hope that it will be ready during month.

content: need more meat. like a story missions
replyContent: Thanks for feedback, you are right, we just added new orcs faction and now we can focus on campaign and enchancing world map.

content: It's ok. I like the art style, but animations could be smoother. Also, the game needs a campaign mode rather than a just a handful of skirmish maps. S9
replyContent: Thanks for feedback, you are right, we just added new orcs faction and now we can focus on campaign and enchancing world map.

content: Feels a little bit incomplete... missing soundtrack and SFX during gameplay... etc! I hope these issues will be settle with a much needed (audio) update to make a better game experience! 🤞

This is great all around. The game is really fun and the devs show dedication to continued development. I've seen the devs reading feedback and actually acting on it. I also appreciate that there is a reasonable price for the game and no microtransactions. Can't wait to see what the future brings for this game/team.
replyContent: Thanks for support, we hope the next bigger update (new faction and several scenarios) will be ready within a month.

content: Awesome artstyle, nice map mechanics, but lacks combat and strategic depth. It feels that most of the battles are just won by bigger armies. Also, would be great to see more races, and maybe leveling up of normal units. The game controls make it easy to take accidental actions screwing up any advantage. It might be easily fixed by introducing some sort of a redwing button.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, new faction is coming soon. Rewind button is really good idea, especially in battle map. We will take a look, how complicated it would be implement it. Good point.

content: great game, alot like Age of wonders or Heroes of might and magic. I can't wait for new content.
replyContent: Thanks for your support, we would like to introduce new faction and few new scenarios in beginning of february.

content: I've been waiting for these kinds of games without microtransactions. Played the tutorial and that alone is worth the price.
It is a nice game that can be improved and extended. Worth playing.
replyContent: Thanks, for your review. We are still improving our game and preparing new content. So it should get even better.

content: I don't want to be too negative because I'd like to see it succeed. The biggest issue is that there is almost no content, a dozen units, 2 races.. I really would like to see more, so support the dev and hope he keeps working it.
replyContent: Thanks for your review. We are still working on our game and we would like to add two more factions to play, but due to the size of team, it will take some time.. So please be patient.

content: Great game but for now still too buggy to consider paying for it. Hope future updates will focus on fixing them. (game overwrites your save files with autosave, random bug that causes that you can't end your turn)
Very likeable game with fantastic 3D rotate view. If you like games like Heroes, you will like this one as well..
